mapper.select: select no, title, content, reg_date as regDate, view_count as viewCount, member_no as memberNo, name, rn from (select c.*, rownum as rn from (select a.*, b.name from notice a, member b where a.member_no=b.no order by a.no desc) c) where (#{noticePage}-1)*5+1 <= rn and rn <= #{noticePage}*5
select a.no, a.title, a.content, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, a.view_count as viewCount, a.member_no as memberNo, b.name from notice a, member b where a.member_no=b.no and a.no=#{no}
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
update notice set view_count=view_count+1 where no=#{no}
